item.title: Automated extraction of endoscopic adenoma detection rates from endoscopic-pathological data is as sensitive and specific as manual extraction
EndoMineR for the extraction of endoscopic and associated pathology data from medical reports
Removal of normal and negative phrases from endoscopic semi-structured text for accurate automated endoscopic audit
